description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nInoculant:
After this creature {ACTION_casts} a spell, it increases the potency of enemies' {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BURNED}, {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_POISON}, and {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BOMB} debuffs by 10%.
name: Old World Microbe
